title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI. The application should not produce a beep sound when selecting this option.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI, the ControlExampleText beeps. Clicking on other buttons also triggers the beep sound.
EB: I expect that choosing SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText should not produce a beep or any sound. The application should remain silent.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open ControlExampleText application.
2. Select 'SWT.MULTI' option.
3. Observe if a beep sound is produced. It should not produce any sound.
